benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/customFields - Add custom fields to account

covered: Valid Payload scenarios (TC01-TC05) - successful creation with required and optional headers
Invalid Payload scenarios (TC06-TC12, TC08-TC09, TC11, TC27-TC28, TC30) - proper 400 errors and messages
Large Payloads (TC14-TC15) - boundary and over-limit handling

Validation scenarios (missing headers TC07, invalid accountId TC06, non-existent account TC10, empty/malformed body TC08/TC09, unsupported fields TC11, empty array TC26, missing required fields TC27, invalid data types TC28, null values TC30) - appropriate error responses
Recovery/Resilience scenarios (TC20, TC17, TC25) - transient/network/service issues and graceful handling
Security tests (TC18-TC19) - SQL injection and XSS payload handling
Performance tests (TC21-TC22) - response time and concurrency under load
Regression tests (TC23-TC24) - backward compatibility and previously fixed issues
Integration/data consistency test (TC25) - inconsistent data handling
Query parameters handling (TC13) - extra query params do not break valid payload processing
Edge case tests (TC26-TC30) - empty input, max/min values, nulls, and data-type variations
Duplicate field name validation (TC12) - handling of duplicates within payload
gaps: Rate limiting / throttling tests (no explicit tests for burst or rapid successive POSTs)
Caching behavior / ETag handling for POST (no caching headers validation)
Forbidden (403) scenarios (no test for authenticated-but-not-authorized users)
500 Internal Server Error scenarios (only 503 tested for service unavailability; 500 not explicitly tested)
Pagination considerations (not applicable to POST but guideline mentions in GET; no explicit pagination testing for POST workflows)
recommendations: Add rate-limiting/throttling tests to verify handling of bursts or rapid repeated POSTs
Add tests for 403 Forbidden to cover authenticated-but-not-authorized cases
Add 500 Internal Server Error scenarios to simulate DB/service failures and ensure proper error handling
Validate caching headers for POST where applicable (ETag, Cache-Control) to cover caching guidelines
Enhance coverage for idempotency and explicit duplicate submission handling
Consolidate payload variations into data-driven tests to reduce duplication and improve maintainability
Clarify null-value handling scenarios (TC30) with explicit expectations based on field definitions
